name: Stickman swing: Rope Swing
description:
Tap the screen when the rope is long enough to swing to the next platform.
Swing through a dangerous world filled with Stickman swing! lethal Lasers and hungry Monsters! You remember that you’re probably gonna lose some body parts along the way!

[HOW TO PLAY]
- Tap and Tap to change flying direction and jump
- Avoid obstacles
- Score as many point as you can

FEATURES:
- Unique active ragdoll physics system
- Crunchy sound effects
- Multiple levels
- Multiple props for level customization
- Replay system with saving and sharing abilities
- Using stickman instead of ordinary crash test dummies
